content: this beautiful top is easy to crochet from the top down the raglan shaping is worked within the stitch pattern the whole top is worked in the round and it is completely seamless sizes range from 36 bust to 52 bust with ample flounce to showcase the yarn s incredible drape at the hemline the kit included 2 3 3 4 4 hanks of be so sporty yarn 100% hand-dyed bamboo yarn 325 yards per 4oz a pod of wrapture all natural delicate wash and the free pattern please choose from the following gorgeous hand-dyed colors chantilly lace iced silver fox pink damask lavenders first romance passionate plum caribbean turquoise jaded peacock harbor fog stormy sea blue danube pure gold sunkissed yellow tropical hot coral crushed berries million dollar red parisian bordeaux
